idea-plugin.name: Groovy
idea-plugin.description:
Adds support for the Groovy language.
  • Coding assistance: code completion, inspections, refactorings, quick documentation, and much more
  • Interactive Groovy console to evaluate code expressions without compilation: Tools | Groovy Console
  • Support for the Grape dependency manager and Gant for scripting Ant tasks using Groovy

registryKey.description: Enables Document based formatting instead of PSI based
Whether to skip substitutor computation if return type doesn't depend on it
Whether to throw error if the element is unexpected in resolve processor
Allows to collect method usages for more precise type inference
Enable type inference with using info from explicitly typed closures
Merges all control flows graphs in method
